name: Rolg - GGJ 2020
description:
The theme for this years global game jam (2020) was repair.

Rolg is a 3d open world exploration game with the intention of finding fruit to repair yourself.  We wanted to create a chill atmosphere and a chilled game play style. Help Rolg collect fruit to repair himself! 

WASD to move, drag the mouse to move the camera and Space to jump when you collect 2 feet (should be after your third fruit )

We were heavily inspired by the "Katamari" series.

Hope you enjoy our small prototype!

Love Just Vibing. x
